channel.title: Getting off of a hamachi, i need to make a real server now
channel.description:
ok im currently running my server on hamachi i want to get it off but i have sevral questions
does a static ip matter? can people join if i have a static ip? and alot more
i port fowarded my router and computer firewall is down nothing is blocking
but why cant people join off of my ip or NO-IP,dyndns and all?
can i have a complete walktrough :(

item.title: Getting off of a hamachi, i need to make a real server now
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

You do know that you connect to localhost and they connect on your no-ip IP?

Read full topic

Well, if your using a client go into the gui.java and change the ip to “yourseverip” then save, compile and re-run and it should work.

item.title: Getting off of a hamachi, i need to make a real server now
item.dc:creator: @Xseil Xseil
item.description:

I did no-ip and portforward and i get an error called error_game_Js5connect.

How can i fix it?

P.S: i’m doing version 508 and i’ve tried 127.0.0.1 and it worked…

item.title: Getting off of a hamachi, i need to make a real server now
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

You need to go to www.no-ip.com and register, then click add host leave everything blank accept for the ip part then use the drop down box to make the last bit like no-ip.org and then you download the no-ip duc and you run it and it should work.

Read full topic
